app_sentences.en: I need to buy a pair of new sports shoes for the race.
app_sentences.cn: 我需要买一双新的运动鞋参加比赛。

data.meaning: adj. 正确的、恰当的、端正的vt.改正

app_sentences.en: Please correct the spelling mistakes in your homework.
app_sentences.cn: 请改正你作业中的拼写错误。

app_sentences.en: You should pay attention to the spelling of English words.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该注意英语单词的拼写。

app_sentences.en: You should try to remember ten new English words every day.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该努力每天记住十个新的英语单词。

app_sentences.en: You should practise speaking English with your classmates every day.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该每天和同学们练习说英语。

app_sentences.en: Our school basketball match will start at three this afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 我们学校的篮球赛将在今天下午三点开始。

app_sentences.en: Did you watch the exciting football match on TV last night?
app_sentences.cn: 昨晚你从电视上看那场精彩的足球赛了吗？

app_sentences.en: Can you tell me the meaning of this difficult word?
app_sentences.cn: 你能告诉我这个难词的意思吗？

data.meaning: adj. 全部的、完全的、完成的vt.完成

app_sentences.en: I need one more hour to complete my science project.
app_sentences.cn: 我需要再多一个小时来完成我的科学项目。

app_sentences.en: Please write a sentence using the new word we learned today.
app_sentences.cn: 请用我们今天学的新词写一个句子。

app_sentences.en: You should use a dictionary to look up new English words.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该用词典来查找英语生词。

data.meaning: n. 文法、有关原理的书、入门的书

app_sentences.en: We learned some new grammar rules in our English class today.
app_sentences.cn: 今天我们在英语课上学了一些新的语法规则。

app_sentences.en: I received a letter from my pen friend in England yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 昨天我收到了英国笔友的一封信。

app_sentences.en: We can look up information about the stars on the internet.
app_sentences.cn: 我们可以在互联网上查找关于星星的信息。

data.meaning: vt. 误解、弄错；vi. 犯错、误认；n. 错误、误会

app_sentences.en: I made a spelling mistake in my English composition.
app_sentences.cn: 我在英语作文里犯了一个拼写错误。

app_sentences.en: It is normal to make a mistake when you learn something new.
app_sentences.cn: 学习新事物时犯错是很正常的。

app_sentences.en: I did not understand the maths problem until my friend explained it.
app_sentences.cn: 直到我朋友解释后，我才理解了那道数学题。

app_sentences.en: My teacher gave me some good advice on how to learn English well.
app_sentences.cn: 我的老师给了我一些关于如何学好英语的好建议。

app_sentences.en: You should finish your homework before you go out to play.
app_sentences.cn: 出去玩之前你应该完成作业。

data.meaning: adj. 可能的、可能存在或发生的

app_sentences.en: Please finish your homework as soon as possible.
app_sentences.cn: 请尽快完成你的作业。

data.meaning: 写下、写文章贬低、降低地位；记录、记下、以文字诋毁

app_sentences.en: Please write down the homework on your notebook clearly.
app_sentences.cn: 请清晰地把作业记在你的笔记本上。

app_sentences.en: I write down new English words in my notebook every day.
app_sentences.cn: 我每天在笔记本上记下新的英语单词。

data.meaning: vt. 忘记、忽略vi.忘记、忘形

app_sentences.en: Don't forget to bring your sports shoes for P.E. class tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 别忘了明天体育课带你的运动鞋。

app_sentences.en: Please do not forget to bring your homework to school tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 请不要忘记明天把你的作业带到学校来。

app_sentences.en: Don't forget to close the window when you leave the room.
app_sentences.cn: 离开房间时别忘了关窗。

app_sentences.en: Can you help me pronounce this new English word correctly?
app_sentences.cn: 你能帮我正确读出这个英语单词的音吗？

app_sentences.en: Please read the story aloud so everyone can hear it.
app_sentences.cn: 请大声朗读故事，以便每个人都能听到。

data.meaning: n. <美>无线电通信、无线电接收装置、无线电广播设备v.用无线电发送

app_sentences.en: My grandfather likes to listen to the news on the radio every morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我祖父喜欢每天早上听收音机里的新闻。

app_sentences.en: Good pronunciation is very important for learning a foreign language.
app_sentences.cn: 良好的发音对学习外语非常重要。

app_sentences.en: The key to learning English well is to practice every day.
app_sentences.cn: 学好英语的关键是每天练习。

app_sentences.en: He put his keys into his pocket and went out to play.
app_sentences.cn: 他把钥匙放进兜里，出去玩了。

data.meaning: n. 主要部分、体力、力量

app_sentences.en: The main reason I like summer is because of the long holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢夏天的主要原因是长假。

app_sentences.en: She got an excellent score on her final science test.
app_sentences.cn: 她在最终的科学考试中取得了优异的分数。

data.meaning: vi. 同意、赞成...的意见、与...一致

app_sentences.en: I agree with you that summer is the best season of the year.
app_sentences.cn: 我同意你的看法，夏天是一年中最好的季节。

app_sentences.en: I agree with my friend that we should go to the park together.
app_sentences.cn: 我同意我朋友的看法，我们应该一起去公园。

app_sentences.en: Reading more books is a good way to increase your vocabulary.
app_sentences.cn: 多读书是增加词汇量的好方法。

app_sentences.en: If you don't know the way, you can ask for help from the police.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你不知道路，你可以向警察寻求帮助。

app_sentences.en: Reading English books every day can help improve your vocabulary.
app_sentences.cn: 每天读英文书可以帮助你提高词汇量。

data.meaning: n. 基本原理、要素、基本规律；adj. 基本的、碱性的；(计算机)BASIC语言

app_sentences.en: We learn basic maths like addition and subtraction in primary school.
app_sentences.cn: 我们在小学学习加法和减法等基础数学。

app_sentences.en: It's time to go to bed; we have to get up early tomorrow.
app_sentences.cn: 该睡觉了；我们明天得早起。

app_sentences.en: Can you advise me on how to learn English more effectively?
app_sentences.cn: 你能建议我如何更有效地学习英语吗？

data.meaning: adj. 怕羞的、畏缩的、害羞的

app_sentences.en: The little boy is very shy and doesn't like talking to strangers.
app_sentences.cn: 那个小男孩很害羞，不喜欢和陌生人说话。

app_sentences.en: We had an interesting conversation about our summer vacation.
app_sentences.cn: 我们进行了一场关于暑假的有趣谈话。

app_sentences.en: She quickly finished her homework and went out to play.
app_sentences.cn: 她很快完成了作业然后出去玩。

data.meaning: adj. 自然的、自然界的、关于自然界的

app_sentences.en: It is natural to feel nervous before speaking in public.
app_sentences.cn: 在公众面前讲话前感到紧张是自然的。

app_sentences.en: We should protect natural resources like water and forests.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该保护水和森林这样的自然资源。

app_sentences.en: I suggest that we meet at the school gate at nine o'clock.
app_sentences.cn: 我建议我们九点在学校门口集合。

app_sentences.en: The library is a quiet place for students to study.
app_sentences.cn: 图书馆是学生学习的安静地方。

app_sentences.en: Beijing is a famous city with many interesting historical places.
app_sentences.cn: 北京是一个有着许多有趣历史古迹的名城。

app_sentences.en: We climbed up the hill to see the beautiful sunrise.
app_sentences.cn: 我们爬上小山去看美丽的日出。

app_sentences.en: China has a very large population of over 1.4 billion people.
app_sentences.cn: 中国人口众多，超过14亿。

data.meaning: adj. 宽的、广阔的、张大的

app_sentences.en: The river near our town is very wide and deep.
app_sentences.cn: 我们镇附近的那条河又宽又深。

data.meaning: num. 百万、百万个n.[pl.] 无数

app_sentences.en: More than a million people visit the museum every year.
app_sentences.cn: 每年有超过一百万人参观这家博物馆。

data.meaning: adj. 漂亮的、可爱的、优美的

app_sentences.en: The garden looks pretty with all the colorful flowers.
app_sentences.cn: 花园里开满五颜六色的花，看起来很漂亮。

app_sentences.en: Her English is pretty good, and she can speak it fluently.
app_sentences.cn: 她的英语相当不错，能说得很流利。

app_sentences.en: My sister is two years younger than me.
app_sentences.cn: 我妹妹比我小两岁。

app_sentences.en: Can you help me get some water from the kitchen?
app_sentences.cn: 你能帮我从厨房拿点水来吗？

app_sentences.en: Can you help me get some water from the kitchen, please?
app_sentences.cn: 请帮我从厨房拿点水来好吗？

app_sentences.en: Can you help me get some water from the small kitchen?
app_sentences.cn: 你能帮我从那个小厨房里拿点水来吗？

app_sentences.en: Beijing is in the north of China and has four seasons.
app_sentences.cn: 北京位于中国北方，四季分明。

data.meaning: n. 南部、南adj.南的、南方的adv.在南方

app_sentences.en: My aunt lives in a small city in the south of China.
app_sentences.cn: 我阿姨住在中国南方的一个小城市。

data.meaning: n. 西方、西部adj.西的、西方的adv.向西方

app_sentences.en: The sun sets in the west and rises in the east every day.
app_sentences.cn: 太阳每天从西边落下，从东边升起。

app_sentences.en: My home town is a small city famous for its tea production.
app_sentences.cn: 我的家乡是一个以产茶闻名的小城市。

app_sentences.en: I like reading books, especially those about history and science.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢读书，尤其是关于历史和科学的书。

app_sentences.en: Our city is famous for its beautiful mountains and lakes.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的城市以其美丽的群山和湖泊而闻名。

app_sentences.en: My dream is to go to a good university after high school.
app_sentences.cn: 我的梦想是高中毕业后去一所好大学。

app_sentences.en: My elder brother studies computer science at a big university.
app_sentences.cn: 我哥哥在一所大型大学学习计算机科学。

data.meaning: n. 岛、岛屿、岛状物(孤立状态的物)

app_sentences.en: They spent their holiday on a beautiful island in the south.
app_sentences.cn: 他们在南方一个美丽的海岛上度过了假期。

app_sentences.en: We went to a beautiful island for our holiday last summer.
app_sentences.cn: 去年夏天我们去了一个美丽的岛屿度假。

app_sentences.en: There is a big playground in the school sports area.
app_sentences.cn: 学校运动区有一个大操场。

data.meaning: n. 低、低价、牛叫声adj.低的

app_sentences.en: The temperature will be very low tonight, so keep warm.
app_sentences.cn: 今晚气温会很低，所以请保暖。

app_sentences.en: Last summer, we climbed a high mountain with my family.
app_sentences.cn: 去年夏天，我们全家爬了一座高山。

data.meaning: n. 乡下地方、乡下居民

app_sentences.en: I like to spend my weekends in the peaceful countryside.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢在宁静的乡下度过周末。

app_sentences.en: Remember to bring an umbrella because it might rain today.
app_sentences.cn: 记得带把伞，因为今天可能会下雨。

app_sentences.en: Baseball is a popular game in the United States and Japan.
app_sentences.cn: 棒球在美联国和日本是一项受欢迎的游戏。

app_sentences.en: We have a volleyball match against Class Two next Monday.
app_sentences.cn: 我们下周一和二班有一场排球比赛。

app_sentences.en: I think the film is boring because nothing exciting happens.
app_sentences.cn: 我认为这部电影很无聊，因为没有发生什么激动人心的事。

data.meaning: adj. 令人兴奋的、使人激动的

app_sentences.en: The school trip to the museum was very exciting for everyone.
app_sentences.cn: 去博物馆的学校旅行对每个人来说都非常令人兴奋。

app_sentences.en: The football match we watched last night was very exciting.
app_sentences.cn: 我们昨晚看的那场足球赛非常精彩。

app_sentences.en: Listening to music is a very relaxing way to spend your free time.
app_sentences.cn: 听音乐是度过闲暇时光的一种非常放松的方式。

app_sentences.en: What was the final score in yesterday's football match?
app_sentences.cn: 昨天足球比赛的最终比分是多少？

app_sentences.en: I have already read this interesting book twice.
app_sentences.cn: 我已经把这本书有趣的书读了两遍。

app_sentences.en: Your health does matter, so sleep early before school every day.
app_sentences.cn: 你的健康确实很重要，所以每天上学前要早睡。

app_sentences.en: It does not matter who wins if everyone learns teamwork.
app_sentences.cn: 如果每个人都学会团队合作，谁赢并不重要。

data.meaning: na. 发生了什么事?；怎么了、出什么事了、你怎么了

app_sentences.en: What's the matter? You look a bit pale and tired today.
app_sentences.cn: 怎么了？你今天看起来有点苍白和疲倦。

app_sentences.en: I accidentally hurt my arm while I was playing football.
app_sentences.cn: 我踢足球时意外弄伤了胳膊。

data.meaning: adj. 令人愉快的、可享受的

app_sentences.en: Our class trip to the museum was a very enjoyable experience.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的博物馆班级旅行是一次非常愉快的体验。

app_sentences.en: Many athletes train for years to compete in the Olympics.
app_sentences.cn: 许多运动员为参加奥运会训练多年。

app_sentences.en: Thousands of people went to the stadium to watch the match.
app_sentences.cn: 数千人去体育场观看了比赛。

app_sentences.en: I miss my primary school teachers and friends very much.
app_sentences.cn: 我非常想念我的小学老师和朋友们。

app_sentences.en: I miss my best friend because she moved to another city.
app_sentences.cn: 我想念我最好的朋友，因为她搬到了另一个城市。

app_sentences.en: I miss my old friends from my primary school.
app_sentences.cn: 我想念我小学时的老朋友。

app_sentences.en: Would you mind closing the window? It's a little cold.
app_sentences.cn: 你介意关一下窗户吗？有点冷。

app_sentences.en: There is plenty of food at the party, so please enjoy it.
app_sentences.cn: 聚会上有充足的食物，所以请享用。

app_sentences.en: There is plenty of fresh fruit and vegetables in the kitchen.
app_sentences.cn: 厨房里有充足的新鲜水果和蔬菜。

data.meaning: n. 敲打、拍子、巡逻区域v.打

app_sentences.en: You need to beat the eggs well before you make the cake.
app_sentences.cn: 做蛋糕前你需要把鸡蛋打好。

app_sentences.en: Our school basketball team beat their team in the final game.
app_sentences.cn: 我们学校的篮球队在决赛中打败了他们队。

app_sentences.en: He was careless and lost his new pencil case on the bus.
app_sentences.cn: 他很粗心，把新铅笔盒丢在公交车上了。

app_sentences.en: We went to the stadium to cheer our school team on.
app_sentences.cn: 我们去体育场为我们的校队加油。

data.meaning: n. 四轮大马车、长途汽车、教练v.训练

app_sentences.en: The football coach teaches us how to play better as a team.
app_sentences.cn: 足球教练教我们如何作为一个团队打得更好。

data.meaning: n. 追星族俱乐部、粉丝俱乐部、后援会

app_sentences.en: She joined the fan club of her favourite pop singer.
app_sentences.cn: 她加入了她最喜欢的流行歌手的歌迷俱乐部。

app_sentences.en: Our school football team will play against their team this Friday.
app_sentences.cn: 我们学校足球队这周五将和他们队比赛。

app_sentences.en: We will take the high-speed train to Beijing next Monday.
app_sentences.cn: 下周一我们将乘高铁去北京。

app_sentences.en: We will take a train to Beijing during the summer holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 暑假期间我们将坐火车去北京。

app_sentences.en: You need more practice if you want to speak English well.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你想英语说得好，你需要更多的练习。

data.meaning: adj. 暖和的、暖的、温暖的

app_sentences.en: The weather is becoming warm and pleasant in the spring.
app_sentences.cn: 春天天气变得温暖宜人。

data.meaning: 热身、重新煮热、变暖；温车

app_sentences.en: It is important to warm up your body before doing sports.
app_sentences.cn: 做运动前热身很重要。

data.meaning: adj. 平常的、通常的、惯例的

app_sentences.en: As usual, he got up early and went for a run in the park.
app_sentences.cn: 像往常一样，他起得很早，去公园跑步了。

data.meaning: adj. 较好的adv.更好的、更多的、更佳的

app_sentences.en: I hope you will feel better after taking this medicine.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望你吃了这药后会感觉好一些。

app_sentences.en: We have many interesting after-school activities like music and sports.
app_sentences.cn: 我们有很多有趣的课外活动，比如音乐和体育。

app_sentences.en: The teacher was very pleased with our hard work this term.
app_sentences.cn: 老师对我们这学期的努力感到非常满意。

app_sentences.en: I hope I can pass all my subjects this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望这学期我能通过所有科目。

app_sentences.en: Please pass the salt to me during dinner.
app_sentences.cn: 请吃饭时把盐递给我。

app_sentences.en: I hope to pass all my exams at the end of this term.
app_sentences.cn: 我希望在这学期末通过我所有的考试。

data.meaning: v. (觉得)可怜n.憾事、怜悯、同情

app_sentences.en: It's a pity that you couldn't come to my birthday party.
app_sentences.cn: 非常遗憾你没能来参加我的生日派对。

data.meaning: n. 机会、可能性、偶然性

app_sentences.en: This is a good chance for you to make new friends at camp.
app_sentences.cn: 这是你在营地结交新朋友的好机会。

app_sentences.en: Don't talk loudly in the library; people are studying there.
app_sentences.cn: 不要在图书馆大声说话；人们在那里学习。

app_sentences.en: She is very confident that she can win the English speech contest.
app_sentences.cn: 她非常有信心她能赢得英语演讲比赛。

app_sentences.en: Be careful when you cross the road. Look left and right first.
app_sentences.cn: 过马路时要小心。先左右看看。

app_sentences.en: Always be careful to avoid a traffic accident when crossing the road.
app_sentences.cn: 过马路时要始终小心，避免发生交通事故。

app_sentences.en: Everyone in our class went to the museum except Tom.
app_sentences.cn: 除了汤姆，我们班每个人都去了博物馆。

app_sentences.en: It is your choice to decide which book to read first.
app_sentences.cn: 由你选择先读哪本书。

app_sentences.en: My deskmate is also my best classmate and friend.
app_sentences.cn: 我的同桌也是我最好的同学和朋友。

app_sentences.en: I often play football with my classmates after school.
app_sentences.cn: 我经常在放学后和同学们一起踢足球。

data.meaning: adj. (常用于书面语)远的、久远的、遥远的adv.(表示空间或时间上的距离)远

app_sentences.en: The new library is not very far from our school.
app_sentences.cn: 新图书馆离我们学校不是很远。

app_sentences.en: We should live far from the noisy city during our holidays.
app_sentences.cn: 假期里我们应该远离喧闹的城市。

app_sentences.en: Please remember to close the window when you leave the room.
app_sentences.cn: 离开房间时请记得关窗。

app_sentences.en: The bus is always very crowded in the morning.
app_sentences.cn: 早上公共汽车总是非常拥挤。

app_sentences.en: He is very hardworking and studies English all the time.
app_sentences.cn: 他非常努力，一直在学习英语。

app_sentences.en: The bus journey from my home to school takes about twenty minutes.
app_sentences.cn: 从我家到学校的公交车旅程大约需要二十分钟。

app_sentences.en: Our journey to the mountains was very exciting and fun.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的山区之行非常令人兴奋且有趣。

app_sentences.en: I decided to book a hotel room online for our holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 我决定在网上为我们的假期预订一间酒店房间。

app_sentences.en: I like reading books about space and wild animals.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢读关于太空和野生动物的书。

data.meaning: n. 公园、停车场、炮场vt.停放(汽车等)

app_sentences.en: We like to walk in the park after dinner every night.
app_sentences.cn: 我们喜欢每天晚饭后在公园里散步。

app_sentences.en: My family often goes to the park for a walk on weekends.
app_sentences.cn: 我们家人通常在周末去公园散步。

data.meaning: n. 外面、外表、外界adj.外面的

app_sentences.en: It is sunny outside, so let's play football in the park.
app_sentences.cn: 外面阳光明媚，我们去公园踢足球吧。

data.meaning: adv. 无论如何、可是、仍然

app_sentences.en: I like swimming; however, I am not very good at it yet.
app_sentences.cn: 我喜欢游泳；然而，我还不是很擅长。

data.meaning: n. 成本、价钱、代价vt.价值为

app_sentences.en: This new bicycle costs too much money for me to buy now.
app_sentences.cn: 这辆新自行车太贵了，我现在买不起。

app_sentences.en: She wants to be a famous actress when she grows up.
app_sentences.cn: 她长大后想成为一名著名的女演员。

app_sentences.en: The young actress won an award for her first film.
app_sentences.cn: 这位年轻的女演员因她的第一部电影而获奖。

app_sentences.en: In ancient China, people often met and talked in a teahouse.
app_sentences.cn: 在中国古代，人们经常在茶馆见面和交谈。

data.meaning: n. 出价、提议、意图vt.提供

app_sentences.en: The shop will offer a discount on all clothes this weekend.
app_sentences.cn: 这家店本周末所有衣服都会打折。

app_sentences.en: At the end of the term, we will have a big party.
app_sentences.cn: 在学期结束时，我们将举办一个大型派对。

app_sentences.en: In the end, they found the lost keys under the sofa.
app_sentences.cn: 最后，他们在沙发下找到了丢失的钥匙。

data.meaning: 不知道、没有想法、没想法

app_sentences.en: I have no idea how to solve this difficult math problem.
app_sentences.cn: 我不知道该如何解决这道难题。

app_sentences.en: In the school play, he will act the role of a brave king.
app_sentences.cn: 在学校话剧里，他将扮演一位勇敢的国王。

app_sentences.en: Can you show me how to solve this difficult problem?
app_sentences.cn: 你能教我怎么解这道难题吗？

data.meaning: adj. 共同的、公共的、公有的

app_sentences.en: It is common for students to feel a little nervous before a test.
app_sentences.cn: 学生在考试前感到有点紧张是很常见的。

data.meaning: adj. 第二十的、二十分之一的n.第二十(个)、二十分之一

app_sentences.en: My birthday is on the twentieth, and my friends will come.
app_sentences.cn: 我的生日在二十号，我的朋友们会来。

app_sentences.en: Our class will present the project on the twentieth of May.
app_sentences.cn: 我们班将在五月二十日展示这个项目。

app_sentences.en: Can you describe your best friend's appearance and personality?
app_sentences.cn: 你能描述一下你最好朋友的外貌和性格吗？

app_sentences.en: Schools play an important role in our modern society.
app_sentences.cn: 学校在我们的现代社会中起着重要的作用。

app_sentences.en: The head teacher gave a speech at the school opening ceremony.
app_sentences.cn: 校长在开学典礼上发表了讲话。

data.meaning: n. (综合大学中的)学院、(独立的)学院、<美>大学

app_sentences.en: My older brother is studying technology at a local college.
app_sentences.cn: 我哥哥在当地一所学院学习技术。

data.meaning: n. 小说、长篇故事adj.新奇的、新颖的

app_sentences.en: I am reading an interesting novel about a young detective.
app_sentences.cn: 我正在读一本关于一位年轻侦探的有趣小说。

app_sentences.en: Can you tell me the name of that beautiful flower?
app_sentences.cn: 你能告诉我那朵漂亮花的名字吗？

data.meaning: conj. (表条件)如果、(表假设)要是、是否

app_sentences.en: If it is sunny tomorrow, we will have a picnic in the park.
app_sentences.cn: 如果明天天气晴朗，我们将在公园里野餐。

app_sentences.en: If it rains tomorrow, we will have to stay at home.
app_sentences.cn: 如果明天下雨，我们将不得不待在家里。

data.meaning: n. 魔法、巫术、戏法adj.魔术的

app_sentences.en: The children watched a magic show at the school party.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们在学校聚会上看了一场魔术表演。

app_sentences.en: The story about the magical forest is very popular now.
app_sentences.cn: 关于魔法森林的故事现在很受欢迎。

app_sentences.en: Some snakes are dangerous, but many are not harmful.
app_sentences.cn: 有些蛇是危险的，但许多蛇没有害处。

app_sentences.en: My school bag is heavy and it sometimes hurts my neck.
app_sentences.cn: 我的书包很重，有时会弄疼我的脖子。

app_sentences.en: The paper is very thin and easy to tear if not careful.
app_sentences.cn: 这纸很薄，如果不小心很容易撕破。

app_sentences.en: Wild animals are in danger because their natural homes are lost.
app_sentences.cn: 野生动物由于天然家园的丧失正处于危险之中。

app_sentences.en: There is danger in playing with fire because it can burn you.
app_sentences.cn: 玩火有危险，因为它会烧伤你。

app_sentences.en: Many wild animals are in danger because of the loss of forests.
app_sentences.cn: 由于森林的丧失，许多野生动物正处于危险之中。

app_sentences.en: At last, we finished our project and felt very happy.
app_sentences.cn: 最后，我们完成了项目，感到非常开心。

data.meaning: adj. 感兴趣的、有成见的、有权益的

app_sentences.en: I am very interested in history and like visiting museums.
app_sentences.cn: 我对历史非常感兴趣，喜欢参观博物馆。

app_sentences.en: My parents allow me to watch TV for one hour after dinner.
app_sentences.cn: 我父母允许我晚饭后看一小时电视。

app_sentences.en: I can't think of any other way to help them at the moment.
app_sentences.cn: 目前我想不出任何其他办法来帮助他们。

data.meaning: vt. 保护 n.保护 解除

app_sentences.en: We should protect wild animals and not hurt them.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该保护野生动物，不伤害它们。

data.meaning: adj. 野性的、野生的、野蛮的

app_sentences.en: We should protect wild animals and their natural homes.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该保护野生动物和它们天然的家。

data.meaning: vi. 生长、成长、渐渐变得

app_sentences.en: Plants need sunlight and water to grow well.
app_sentences.cn: 植物需要阳光和水才能生长得好。

app_sentences.en: My grandfather likes to grow vegetables in his garden.
app_sentences.cn: 我祖父喜欢在他的花园里种蔬菜。

app_sentences.en: Many flowers and trees begin to grow in the early spring.
app_sentences.cn: 许多花木在早春开始生长。

app_sentences.en: Please don't take away my dictionary; I need it for the class.
app_sentences.cn: 请别拿走我的词典；我上课需要它。

data.meaning: adj. 足够的、充足的、只够做...的n.充足

app_sentences.en: Do we have enough time to finish all the homework?
app_sentences.cn: 我们有足够的时间完成所有作业吗？

app_sentences.en: We all hope that there will be peace in every country.
app_sentences.cn: 我们都希望每个国家都能和平。

app_sentences.en: Everyone hopes that the whole world can live in peace.
app_sentences.cn: 每个人都希望全世界能生活在和平中。

data.meaning: n. 通知、布告、注意v.注意到

app_sentences.en: Did you notice the new painting on the classroom wall?
app_sentences.cn: 你注意到教室墙上的新画了吗？

app_sentences.en: Please look after my little dog when I am away on holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 我度假不在家时，请帮我照顾我的小狗。

app_sentences.en: Can you help me look after my dog when I am not at home?
app_sentences.cn: 我不在家时，你能帮我照顾我的狗吗？

data.meaning: n. 上升、高地、提出vt.升起

app_sentences.en: We want to raise money to buy new books for the school library.
app_sentences.cn: 我们想筹钱为学校图书馆购买新书。

data.meaning: n. 研究、调查vi.研究、调查

app_sentences.en: For our project, we did some research on the life of pandas.
app_sentences.cn: 为了我们的项目，我们做了一些关于熊猫生活的研究。

app_sentences.en: My aunt has a new baby who is very cute and small.
app_sentences.cn: 我阿姨有一个非常可爱且弱小的小宝宝。

data.meaning: n. 情形、境遇、(建筑物等的)位置

app_sentences.en: In a dangerous situation, we should stay calm and ask for help.
app_sentences.cn: 在危险情况下，我们应该保持冷静并寻求帮助。

app_sentences.en: The scientist works in a laboratory to find new medicines.
app_sentences.cn: 那位科学家在实验室工作，寻找新药物。

data.meaning: n. 产物、农产品vt.提出、出示

app_sentences.en: Trees produce oxygen that is very important for us to breathe.
app_sentences.cn: 树木产生氧气，这对我们呼吸非常重要。

data.meaning: n. 西南方adj.西南的、向西南方的

app_sentences.en: They decided to travel to the southwest of China next summer.
app_sentences.cn: 他们决定明年夏天去中国西南部旅游。

app_sentences.en: He worked hard in order to pass the difficult math exam.
app_sentences.cn: 他努力学习是为了通过那场很难的数学考试。

app_sentences.en: The local government built a new hospital for the community.
app_sentences.cn: 当地政府为社区新建了一家医院。

app_sentences.en: The sun will set in the west in about one hour.
app_sentences.cn: 太阳大约一小时后将在西方落下。

data.meaning: 设立；调定、装置妥、装置妥当

app_sentences.en: They decided to set up a new school library for the students.
app_sentences.cn: 他们决定为学生们建立一个新的学校图书馆。

data.meaning: n. 自然、自然界、大自然

app_sentences.en: We should love and protect the beauty of nature.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该热爱和保护大自然的美。

app_sentences.en: We had a wonderful picnic in the nature park last weekend.
app_sentences.cn: 上周末我们在自然公园进行了一次美妙的野餐。

app_sentences.en: Children develop new skills quickly when they are young.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们在小时候能很快发展新技能。

data.meaning: n. 饲养、饲料、(动物或婴儿的)一餐vt.喂养

app_sentences.en: We feed the fish in the pond with special food every day.
app_sentences.cn: 我们每天用特殊的食物喂池塘里的鱼。

app_sentences.en: The heart is often a symbol of love and friendship.
app_sentences.cn: 心通常是爱和友谊的象征。

app_sentences.en: Be careful not to fall on the wet floor in the hallway.
app_sentences.cn: 小心别在走廊潮湿的地板上摔倒。

app_sentences.en: Leaves turn yellow and fall from the trees in autumn.
app_sentences.cn: 秋天，树叶变黄并从树上落下。

app_sentences.en: Please follow me, and I will show you to your new classroom.
app_sentences.cn: 请跟我来，我带你去你的新教室。

app_sentences.en: There is a small hole in my sock, so I need to buy new ones.
app_sentences.cn: 我的袜子上有一个小洞，所以我需要买新袜子。

app_sentences.en: The little girl has a white rabbit with long ears.
app_sentences.cn: 那个小女孩有一只长着长耳朵的白兔。

app_sentences.en: Ssh! Please be quiet; the baby is sleeping in the room.
app_sentences.cn: 嘘！请安静；宝宝正在房间里睡觉。

app_sentences.en: Don't throw rubbish on the ground. Put it in the bin.
app_sentences.cn: 不要把垃圾扔在地上，放进垃圾桶里。

app_sentences.en: There are many yellow leaves on the ground in early autumn.
app_sentences.cn: 初秋地上有很多黄叶。

app_sentences.en: The children sat on the ground to have their picnic under the tree.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们坐在地上，在树下野餐。

app_sentences.en: There are many yellow leaves on the ground in autumn.
app_sentences.cn: 秋天地上有很多黄叶。

data.meaning: n. 茶话会、(下午) 茶会、在美国各地抗议高额税收；茶党、茶叶党、茶聚

app_sentences.en: She invited all her friends to a small tea party last Sunday.
app_sentences.cn: 上周日她邀请所有的朋友来参加一个小茶话会。

app_sentences.en: I have visited the Great Wall twice with my family.
app_sentences.cn: 我和家人一起去过长城两次。

app_sentences.en: I have visited the Great Wall once or twice with my parents.
app_sentences.cn: 我和父母一起去过长城一两次。

app_sentences.en: It started to rain suddenly when we were playing football.
app_sentences.cn: 我们踢足球时，天突然开始下雨了。

data.meaning: n. 粉红色、石竹花、化身

app_sentences.en: The little girl's room is decorated with many pink flowers.
app_sentences.cn: 小女孩的房间里装饰着许多粉色的花。

app_sentences.en: He put his keys into his pocket and went out to play.
app_sentences.cn: 他把钥匙放进兜里，出去玩了。

app_sentences.en: Farmers work in the rice field from morning until evening.
app_sentences.cn: 农民们从早到晚在稻田里劳作。

app_sentences.en: The children are playing happily in the large green field.
app_sentences.cn: 孩子们正在那片大草地上开心地玩耍。

app_sentences.en: You should think about your future and work hard now.
app_sentences.cn: 你应该思考你的未来，现在就开始努力。

data.meaning: adj. 深的、纵深的、远离中心的

app_sentences.en: The swimming pool has a deep end and a shallow end.
app_sentences.cn: 游泳池有一个深水区和一个浅水区。

data.meaning: n. 一会儿、时间 conj.当...的时候、虽然vt.消磨 prep.<古><方>直到

app_sentences.en: I listen to music while I am doing my homework.
app_sentences.cn: 我做作业时听音乐。

data.meaning: n. 陆地、(书面语)国家、国土

app_sentences.en: The airplane will land at the airport in about thirty minutes.
app_sentences.cn: 飞机大约三十分钟后将在机场降落。

data.meaning: adj. 干的、干燥的、口渴的vt.(使)干燥

app_sentences.en: We hung our wet clothes outside to let them become dry.
app_sentences.cn: 我们把湿衣服挂在外面让它们变干。

app_sentences.en: She looked a bit pale because she didn't sleep well last night.
app_sentences.cn: 她看起来有点苍白，因为她昨晚没睡好。

app_sentences.en: The sun begins to appear in the east early in the morning.
app_sentences.cn: 清晨，太阳开始从东方出现。

app_sentences.en: The moon looks very round and bright on Mid-Autumn Festival.
app_sentences.cn: 中秋节时月亮看起来又圆又亮。

data.meaning: n. 角落、(街道)拐角处、(遥远的)地区

app_sentences.en: There is a small post office on the corner of the street.
app_sentences.cn: 街道转角处有一家小邮局。

app_sentences.en: Be careful not to hit the ball too hard, or it will fly away.
app_sentences.cn: 小心别把球打得太重，否则它会飞走的。

data.meaning: adj. 高兴的、乐意的、感到高兴的

app_sentences.en: I am glad that you could come to my birthday party yesterday.
app_sentences.cn: 我很高兴你昨天能来我的生日聚会。

app_sentences.en: We arrived at the station just in time to catch the train.
app_sentences.cn: 我们及时赶到车站，赶上了火车。

app_sentences.en: He fell off his bike and hurt his knee yesterday afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 昨天下午他从自行车上摔下来，伤到了膝盖。

data.meaning: vt. 冒...的危险n.冒险、风险

app_sentences.en: Climbing that high mountain alone is a big risk to take.
app_sentences.cn: 独自攀登那座高山是一个很大的风险。

app_sentences.en: Please pay attention to the teacher while she is talking.
app_sentences.cn: 老师讲话时请注意听。

app_sentences.en: You must pay attention to the teacher when she is speaking.
app_sentences.cn: 老师讲话时你必须注意听。

app_sentences.en: My school is on the other side of the park.
app_sentences.cn: 我的学校在公园的另一边。

app_sentences.en: The two friends walked side by side along the river.
app_sentences.cn: 那两个朋友并排走在河边。

data.meaning: v. 咬、刺痛、穿透；n. 咬、一口

app_sentences.en: Be careful! The dog might bite you if you are not careful.
app_sentences.cn: 小心！如果你不小心的话，那只狗可能会咬你。

app_sentences.en: It took us two hours to climb to the top of the hill.
app_sentences.cn: 我们花了两个小时爬到了小山顶。

app_sentences.en: They like to climb mountains to enjoy the fresh air.
app_sentences.cn: 他们喜欢爬山以享受新鲜空气。

data.meaning: n. 兽皮、皮革v.剥...的皮、痛打

app_sentences.en: The little cat likes to hide under the bed when it sees strangers.
app_sentences.cn: 那只小猫看到陌生人时喜欢躲在床底下。

app_sentences.en: Please throw the rubbish into the bin to keep our classroom clean.
app_sentences.cn: 请把垃圾扔进垃圾桶以保持教室清洁。

app_sentences.en: Please put the milk and eggs into the fridge to keep them fresh.
app_sentences.cn: 请把牛奶和鸡蛋放进冰箱以保持新鲜。

app_sentences.en: He felt a sharp pain in his arm after falling down.
app_sentences.cn: 摔倒后，他感到胳膊一阵剧痛。

data.meaning: n. (人或事)较坏者、更坏的事、更恶劣的事

app_sentences.en: My cold is worse today, so I need to stay at home and rest.
app_sentences.cn: 我今天感冒更严重了，所以我需要呆在家里休息。

app_sentences.en: If you have a fever, you should take some medicine and rest.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你发烧了，你应该吃点药并休息。

app_sentences.en: The noise from the construction site next door is very loud.
app_sentences.cn: 隔壁建筑工地的噪音非常大。

data.meaning: v. 准备、预备、有能力而且愿意

app_sentences.en: We need to prepare some food and drinks for the party.
app_sentences.cn: 我们需要为派对准备一些食物和饮料。

app_sentences.en: He had to write a report about his trip to the museum.
app_sentences.cn: 他必须写一份关于他博物馆之行的报告。

app_sentences.en: The population of the world is more than seven billion now.
app_sentences.cn: 现在世界人口已经超过了七十亿。

data.meaning: adj. 巨大的、极大的、无限的

app_sentences.en: We saw a huge elephant at the zoo last weekend.
app_sentences.cn: 上周末我们在动物园看到了一头巨大的大象。

data.meaning: n. 增加、增大、增长vt.增加

app_sentences.en: The price of the storybook will increase from next month.
app_sentences.cn: 从下个月起，那本故事书的价格将会上涨。

app_sentences.en: Hang on a minute! I need to find my keys before we leave.
app_sentences.cn: 等一下！出发前我需要找到我的钥匙。

data.meaning: Lotus公司出品的群件系列软件

app_sentences.en: I always take notes during the English class to remember words.
app_sentences.cn: 我总是在英语课上记笔记以记住单词。

data.meaning: n. 原因、导致某事发生的人或事、动机

app_sentences.en: Eating too much sugar can cause health problems like toothache.
app_sentences.cn: 吃太多糖会导致如牙痛等健康问题。

app_sentences.en: If you have any problem with your study, please ask the teacher.
app_sentences.cn: 如果你学习上有任何问题，请问老师。

data.meaning: vi. 生长、成长、渐渐变得

app_sentences.en: Plants need sunlight and water to grow well.
app_sentences.cn: 植物需要阳光和水才能生长得好。

app_sentences.en: My grandfather likes to grow vegetables in his garden.
app_sentences.cn: 我祖父喜欢在他的花园里种蔬菜。

app_sentences.en: Many flowers and trees begin to grow in the early spring.
app_sentences.cn: 许多花木在早春开始生长。

app_sentences.en: I remember the date of my little sister's birth very clearly.
app_sentences.cn: 我非常清楚地记得我妹妹出生的日期。

data.meaning: adj. 平坦的、扁平的、单调的

app_sentences.en: The land near the river is very flat and good for farming.
app_sentences.cn: 河边的土地非常平坦，适合耕作。

app_sentences.en: Don't throw rubbish on the floor; put it into the bin.
app_sentences.cn: 不要把垃圾扔在地上；把它放进垃圾桶里。

data.meaning: adj. 静止的、宁静的、从容的n.安静

app_sentences.en: Please keep quiet in the library so that everyone can study.
app_sentences.cn: 请在图书馆保持安静，以便大家学习。

data.meaning: adj. 地方的、当地的、局部的

app_sentences.en: We buy fresh bread from the local bakery every morning.
app_sentences.cn: 我们每天早上都从当地的面包店购买新鲜面包。

app_sentences.en: Our neighborhood has a local market with many fresh vegetables.
app_sentences.cn: 我们小区有一个当地市场，那里有很多新鲜蔬菜。

app_sentences.en: The old factory had to close down because of its high costs.
app_sentences.cn: 由于成本太高，那家旧工厂不得不关闭。

data.meaning: vt. 提及、说起n.提及、说起v.论及

app_sentences.en: Did he mention anything about the class meeting during dinner?
app_sentences.cn: 他在晚饭时提到关于班会的事情了吗？

app_sentences.en: Air pollution is a serious problem in many big cities.
app_sentences.cn: 空气污染是许多大城市的一个严重问题。

app_sentences.en: He tried his best to solve the difficult math problem.
app_sentences.cn: 他竭尽全力去解决那道难题。

data.meaning: n. 公众、(特定的)人群、公共场所adj.公众的

app_sentences.en: We should protect the public environment and keep it clean.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该保护公共环境并保持其清洁。

data.meaning: n. 服务、服务性工作、服役

app_sentences.en: The service at this restaurant is very good and the food is delicious.
app_sentences.cn: 这家餐厅的服务很好，食物也很美味。

app_sentences.en: There are about fifty pupils in our class from different towns.
app_sentences.cn: 我们班大约有五十名来自不同城镇的小学生。

app_sentences.en: We should reduce the use of plastic bags to help the environment.
app_sentences.cn: 我们应该减少使用塑料袋以帮助环境。

app_sentences.en: We used old boxes to create a model spaceship for science class.
app_sentences.cn: 我们用旧盒子为科学课制作了一个宇宙飞船模型。

app_sentences.en: It is very convenient to have a supermarket near our home.
app_sentences.cn: 我们家附近有个超市非常方便。

app_sentences.en: It is important to protect the environment for future generations.
app_sentences.cn: 为子孙后代保护环境非常重要。

app_sentences.en: A white cloud shaped like a rabbit moved slowly across the sky.
app_sentences.cn: 一朵形状像兔子的白云缓缓飘过天空。

app_sentences.en: I take a quick shower every morning before I go to school.
app_sentences.cn: 我每天早晨上学前快速冲个澡。

app_sentences.en: The mountain is covered with white snow in the winter.
app_sentences.cn: 冬天，山上被白雪覆盖。

data.meaning: vt. 猛攻；vi. 起风、猛冲、怒吼；n. 暴风雨、骚动、风波

app_sentences.en: We stayed at home because of the heavy rain and strong storm.
app_sentences.cn: 因为大雨和强烈的风暴，我们待在家里。

data.meaning: adj. 多云的、阴天的、阴沉

app_sentences.en: It's a cloudy day, so it might rain later this afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 今天阴天，所以今天下午晚些时候可能会下雨。

app_sentences.en: I stayed at home and read books on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 在一个下雨的周日下午，我待在家里看书。

app_sentences.en: We had a snowy day last week and made a big snowman.
app_sentences.cn: 上周我们遇到了下雪天，堆了一个大雪人。

data.meaning: adj. 阳光充足的、照耀的、快乐的

app_sentences.en: It's a sunny day today, so let's go for a picnic in the park.
app_sentences.cn: 今天天气晴朗，我们去公园野餐吧。

data.meaning: adj. 有风的、刮风的、多风的

app_sentences.en: It's very windy today, so be careful when you walk outside.
app_sentences.cn: 今天风很大，所以你在外面走的时候要小心。

app_sentences.en: In winter, children like to skate on the ice in the park.
app_sentences.cn: 冬天，孩子们喜欢在公园的冰上滑冰。

app_sentences.en: She wore a thick coat to keep warm in the cold winter wind.
app_sentences.cn: 她穿了一件厚外套在寒冷的冬风中保暖。

data.meaning: n. 冰冻食品vt.冰冻、覆以冰vi.结冰 [军] Intenal Combustion Engine、内燃机

app_sentences.en: In winter, the lake is covered with a thick layer of ice.
app_sentences.cn: 冬天，湖面上覆盖着一层厚厚的冰。

data.meaning: n. 笑话、玩笑v.(和...)开玩笑

app_sentences.en: He told a funny joke that made everyone in the class laugh.
app_sentences.cn: 他讲了一个有趣的笑话，让班上每个人都笑了。

data.meaning: v. (past tense、past participle of may see may)n.力量、威力

app_sentences.en: It might rain later, so take an umbrella with you.
app_sentences.cn: 稍后可能会下雨，所以带把伞吧。

app_sentences.en: The temperature will rise to twenty degrees this afternoon.
app_sentences.cn: 今天下午气温将升至二十度。

data.meaning: adj. 负的、减的 prep.减去n.负数

app_sentences.en: The temperature dropped to minus five degrees last night.
app_sentences.cn: 昨晚气温降到了零下五度。

app_sentences.en: It is thirty degrees today, so we need more water.
app_sentences.cn: 今天三十度，所以我们需要多喝水。

app_sentences.en: The weather reached thirty degrees, so we stayed inside at noon.
app_sentences.cn: 气温达到三十度，所以我们中午待在室内。

app_sentences.en: Although it was raining, we still went for a walk.
app_sentences.cn: 虽然下着雨，但我们还是去散步了。

data.meaning: adj. 湿的、潮湿的、有雨的

app_sentences.en: Don't walk on the floor while it's still wet after cleaning.
app_sentences.cn: 地刚洗完还湿着的时候不要在上面走。

data.meaning: adj. 两者都不 conj.既不...又不、也不

app_sentences.en: Neither my brother nor my sister likes to eat vegetables.
app_sentences.cn: 我弟弟和妹妹都不喜欢吃蔬菜。

data.meaning: adj. 很糟的、极坏的、可怕的

app_sentences.en: I had a terrible headache yesterday, so I stayed in bed all day.
app_sentences.cn: 我昨天头痛得厉害，所以一整天都躺在床上。

app_sentences.en: I wish you a happy birthday and a wonderful new year.
app_sentences.cn: 我祝你生日快乐，新的一年万事如意。

app_sentences.en: It will probably rain tonight, so don't forget your umbrella.
app_sentences.cn: 今晚可能会下雨，所以别忘了带伞。

app_sentences.en: Come on! We are going to be late for the school meeting.
app_sentences.cn: 快点！我们学校开会要迟到了。

app_sentences.en: The nearest shop is about a mile away from our house.
app_sentences.cn: 最近的商店离我们家大约一英里远。

app_sentences.en: The moon looks very round and bright on Mid-Autumn Festival.
app_sentences.cn: 中秋节时月亮看起来又圆又亮。

app_sentences.en: The wind is blowing from the northwest today, so it's cold.
app_sentences.cn: 今天风从西北方向吹来，所以很冷。

app_sentences.en: Our city is located in the southeast part of China.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的城市位于中国东南部。

app_sentences.en: I visit my grandparents in the countryside from time to time.
app_sentences.cn: 我偶尔会去乡下看望我的祖父母。

app_sentences.en: He always wears a red baseball cap to protect his face from the sun.
app_sentences.cn: 他总是戴着一顶红色的棒球帽来保护脸部不被太阳晒。

app_sentences.en: My grandfather teaches me how to play chess every Sunday.
app_sentences.cn: 我爷爷每个星期天都教我下国际象棋。

app_sentences.en: My grandfather and I often play chess on Sunday afternoons.
app_sentences.cn: 我和我祖父常在周日下午下国际象棋。

app_sentences.en: The sun will set in the west in about one hour.
app_sentences.cn: 太阳大约一小时后将在西方落下。

app_sentences.en: My father gave me a new chess set for my birthday.
app_sentences.cn: 我爸爸送了我一套新的国际象棋作为生日礼物。

app_sentences.en: Most people in China use chopsticks to eat their meals.
app_sentences.cn: 中国的大多数人用筷子吃饭。

data.meaning: vi. 玩弄、戏弄、调情；n. 玩具、小玩艺儿、小型的东西；adj. 供玩耍的、作为玩具的

app_sentences.en: The little boy likes to play with his toy cars on the floor.
app_sentences.cn: 那个小男孩喜欢在地板上玩他的玩具车。

app_sentences.en: Our teacher showed us an interesting video about wild animals.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的老师给我们看了一个关于野生动物的有趣视频。

app_sentences.en: Don't spend too much time playing video games on weekends.
app_sentences.cn: 周末不要花太多时间玩电子游戏。

app_sentences.en: His parents gave him a new laptop as a birthday gift.
app_sentences.cn: 他的父母送给他一台新笔记本电脑作为生日礼物。

app_sentences.en: I received a beautiful book as a gift for my birthday.
app_sentences.cn: 我收到一本精美的书作为生日礼物。

app_sentences.en: His parents gave him a new book as a birthday gift.
app_sentences.cn: 他的父母送给他一本新书作为生日礼物。

data.meaning: n. 惊奇、诧异、惊人之事

app_sentences.en: My classmates prepared a birthday surprise for me last week.
app_sentences.cn: 我的同学们上周为我准备了一个生日惊喜。

app_sentences.en: You should start your homework immediately after you get home.
app_sentences.cn: 你回家后应该立即开始写作业。

app_sentences.en: Can you tell the difference between these two pictures?
app_sentences.cn: 你能说出这两张图片的区别吗？

app_sentences.en: I gladly accept your invitation to your birthday party.
app_sentences.cn: 我很高兴接受你生日派对的邀请。

app_sentences.en: Eating mooncakes is a famous tradition in the Mid-Autumn Festival.
app_sentences.cn: 吃月饼是中秋节的一个著名传统。

app_sentences.en: The teacher showed us an example of a good book report.
app_sentences.cn: 老师给我们看了一份优秀读书报告的范例。

app_sentences.en: Many sports, for example, football and basketball, are very popular.
app_sentences.cn: 许多运动，例如足球和篮球，都非常受欢迎。

app_sentences.en: You must finish your homework before you watch TV.
app_sentences.cn: 你必须在看电视之前完成作业。

app_sentences.en: March is my favourite month because the flowers start to bloom.
app_sentences.cn: 三月是我最喜欢的月份，因为花儿开始绽放。

data.meaning: adj. 严肃的、认真的、严重的

app_sentences.en: We must be serious when the teacher is explaining important points.
app_sentences.cn: 老师讲解重点时我们必须认真。

app_sentences.en: The soup tastes very delicious and fresh with some vegetables.
app_sentences.cn: 放了些蔬菜后，这汤尝起来非常鲜美。

app_sentences.en: My first experience of camping was fun but also a little scary.
app_sentences.cn: 我第一次露营的经历很有趣，但也有点吓人。

app_sentences.en: I will stay at my grandparents' house during the winter holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 寒假期间我将待在祖父母家。

app_sentences.en: I will stay at my grandparents' house during the summer holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 暑假期间我会待在祖父母家。

app_sentences.en: I think someone is knocking on the door of our classroom.
app_sentences.cn: 我想有人在敲我们教室的门。

app_sentences.en: I saw the ocean for the first time during my last holiday.
app_sentences.cn: 在上次假期中，我第一次见到了大海。

data.meaning: n. 夹心面包、三明治vt.夹入中间v.做成三明治

app_sentences.en: I make a cheese sandwich to take to school for lunch.
app_sentences.cn: 我做了一个奶酪三明治带到学校当午餐。

data.meaning: n. 碎片、筹码v.削成碎片、碎裂 芯片

app_sentences.en: We sometimes eat fish and chips for dinner on Saturdays.
app_sentences.cn: 我们有时星期六晚餐吃炸鱼和薯条。

app_sentences.en: Fish and chips is a very famous traditional British food.
app_sentences.cn: 炸鱼加薯条是一道非常有名的英国传统食物。

app_sentences.en: The cat jumped onto the table to reach the milk.
app_sentences.cn: 猫跳到桌子上够牛奶。

data.meaning: n. 阁下、先生、有身分的人

app_sentences.en: He is a true gentleman who always holds the door for others.
app_sentences.cn: 他是一位真正的绅士，总是为别人扶着门。

app_sentences.en: My bag is heavy, and it hurts my shoulder after a long walk.
app_sentences.cn: 我的包很重，走了一段长路后我的肩膀很痛。

data.meaning: adj. 坏掉的、患病的、被制服的

app_sentences.en: I have to repair my broken bicycle before I go out.
app_sentences.cn: 我出门前必须修理好我坏掉的自行车。

data.meaning: n. 玻璃、玻璃制品、玻璃杯

app_sentences.en: The window is made of glass, so be careful not to break it.
app_sentences.cn: 窗户是玻璃做的，所以小心别打碎它。

app_sentences.en: The window is made of glass, so be careful with it.
app_sentences.cn: 窗户是玻璃做的，所以请小心。

app_sentences.en: He ran up the stairs to get his schoolbag from his room.
app_sentences.cn: 他跑上楼梯，从房间里拿书包。

app_sentences.en: The charity provided aid to the people after the big earthquake.
app_sentences.cn: 在那次大地震后，慈善机构为人们提供了援助。

app_sentences.en: Every student should learn some basic first aid skills.
app_sentences.cn: 每个学生都应该学习一些基本的急救技能。

data.meaning: n. 医生、体格检查adj.医学的、内科的

app_sentences.en: He wants to be a medical worker to help sick people when he grows up.
app_sentences.cn: 他长大后想成为一名医务工作者来帮助生病的人。

app_sentences.en: Can you imagine what life will be like in fifty years?
app_sentences.cn: 你能想象五十年后的生活会是什么样子吗？

app_sentences.en: He dove deep into the pool to touch the bottom.
app_sentences.cn: 他跳进泳池深处去摸池底。

app_sentences.en: You can find some useful notes at the bottom of the page.
app_sentences.cn: 你可以在页面底部找到一些有用的笔记。

data.meaning: adj. 错误的、不正当的、道德不好的

app_sentences.en: Don't be afraid to make a wrong choice occasionally.
app_sentences.cn: 偶尔做出错误的选择不要紧。

app_sentences.en: What's wrong with your computer? It doesn't seem to work now.
app_sentences.cn: 你的电脑怎么了？现在好像不能用了。

app_sentences.en: I have trouble understanding this difficult maths problem.
app_sentences.cn: 我理解这道数学难题有困难。

app_sentences.en: Can you help me lift this heavy box up to the second floor?
app_sentences.cn: 你能帮我把这个重箱子搬到二楼吗？

app_sentences.en: He lifted up his hand to ask the teacher a question.
app_sentences.cn: 他举起手向老师提问。

app_sentences.en: Eating too much sugar is harmful to your teeth and health.
app_sentences.cn: 吃太多糖对你的牙齿和健康有害。

data.meaning: v. 滴下、落下、(使声音等)变弱

app_sentences.en: Be careful not to drop the glass on the floor.
app_sentences.cn: 小心别把玻璃杯掉在地上。

app_sentences.en: The football players need a lot of training to win the game.
app_sentences.cn: 足球运动员需要大量的训练才能赢得比赛。

app_sentences.en: Please make sure that all the windows are closed before you leave.
app_sentences.cn: 请确保在离开前所有的窗户都关好了。

data.meaning: n. 盖子、封面、藉口vt.覆盖

app_sentences.en: Please cover your books with paper to protect them.
app_sentences.cn: 请用纸把你的书包起来以保护它们。

data.meaning: n. 地震、[喻]在震荡、在变动

app_sentences.en: The earthquake caused a lot of damage to the buildings.
app_sentences.cn: 地震对建筑物造成了很大破坏。

app_sentences.en: The earthquake caused some damage to buildings in the city.
app_sentences.cn: 地震对城市里的一些建筑造成了破坏。

app_sentences.en: The big earthquake destroyed many houses in the small town.
app_sentences.cn: 那场大地震摧毁了小镇上的许多房子。

data.meaning: vt. 警告、注意、通知vi.发出警告

app_sentences.en: The sign warns people not to swim in the deep part of the lake.
app_sentences.cn: 标志警告人们不要在湖的深水区游泳。

app_sentences.en: It's warm inside the house, but it's cold outside today.
app_sentences.cn: 今天房子里很暖和，但外面很冷。

app_sentences.en: It is warm inside the room even if it's cold outside.
app_sentences.cn: 即使外面很冷，房间里还是很温暖。

data.meaning: prep. 在...之下、在...之内、在...领导下

app_sentences.en: There is a small cat sleeping under the wooden chair.
app_sentences.cn: 木椅下睡着一只小猫。

app_sentences.en: Please open the window to let some fresh air into the room.
app_sentences.cn: 请开窗让新鲜空气进到房间里。

app_sentences.en: Please keep the classroom clean and tidy after lessons.
app_sentences.cn: 课后请保持教室干净整洁。

app_sentences.en: Please keep the classroom clean and tidy.
app_sentences.cn: 请保持教室干净整洁。

data.meaning: adj. 清楚的、清晰的、清澈的

app_sentences.en: The water in the river is very clear and clean.
app_sentences.cn: 河里的水非常清澈干净。

app_sentences.en: Please keep clear of the construction area for your safety.
app_sentences.cn: 为了您的安全，请远离施工区域。

data.meaning: adj. (天气、海洋等)静的、平静的

app_sentences.en: The sea is very calm and peaceful early in the morning.
app_sentences.cn: 清晨的大海非常平静祥和。

app_sentences.en: The brave firefighter saved the cat from the tall tree.
app_sentences.cn: 那位勇敢的消防员从高高的树上救下了那只猫。

data.meaning: adj. 有帮助的、有用的、有益的

app_sentences.en: Our English teacher is very helpful and always answers our questions.
app_sentences.cn: 我们的英语老师非常有帮助，总是回答我们的问题。

app_sentences.en: Knowledge gives us the power to change the world.
app_sentences.cn: 知识给予我们改变世界的力量。
